name: BLACK DAY
description: BLACK DAY is a single player Sandbox tactical shooter that allows you to personalize the game experience by setting different variables such as equipment, location, difficulty and type of Hostile encounters.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Core i5 (3Ghz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB RAM card (DirectX 11) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 42 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Core i7+ (4Ghz) Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB RAM card (DirectX 11) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 42 GB available space
